Key Match Events: Canada scored a goal in the 82nd minute, making the score 1-1.
The match went to penalties after a 0-0 draw in regular time.
David scored the winning goal for Canada in the penalty shootout.
Post-Match Reflections: Canada finished fourth at Copa America 2024, capturing the hearts of people worldwide.
Canada's performance in the tournament was praised for bravery and grace against top teams.
The match was described as a tough end for Canada, but a proud achievement overall.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The assistant referee indicated five minutes of added time in the final minutes of the match.
